header.description:
gives mobs custom skins dependent on The biome they are in
By win epic fin
The world must be on experimental mode for the pack to work
header.name: Adapted Mobs V2

subpacks.name:
persistent
this mode must be used with the addon
textures will never change when the mobs move biome

non persistent
this mode can be used without the addon
textures will update as soon as the mob moves biome
